name: Fogbugz - Clean
description:
This style cleans up Fogbugz.

- Arial typeface.
- Whitespace where necessary.
- Bigger, better navigation buttons.
- Bigger logo
- Rounded corners
- Changed the color of links and visited links.
- Commenting of the CSS for easier customization - Add your own bigger logo.

Higher Quality Preview: http://tinyurl.com/6c69d9
